de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.application.cache

Class CacheDoubleDistanceInOnDiskMatrix<O,D extends NumberDistance<D,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.application.AbstractApplication
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.application.cache.CacheDoubleDistanceInOnDiskMatrix<O,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    D - Distance type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    InspectionUtilFrequentlyScanned, Parameterizable

    public class CacheDoubleDistanceInOnDiskMatrix<O,D extends NumberDistance<D,?>>
extends AbstractApplication
    Wrapper to convert a traditional text-serialized result into a on-disk matrix for random access.
